exercises.title: The Hundred
exercises.description: Classic Pilates warm-up. Pump arms while holding legs in tabletop or extended position.
exercises.description_es: Calentamiento clásico de Pilates. Bombea los brazos mientras mantienes las piernas en posición de mesa o extendidas.

exercises.title: Pelvic Curl
exercises.description: Warm up the spine by rolling up and down through each vertebra.
exercises.description_es: Calienta la columna rodando hacia arriba y abajo por cada vértebra.

exercises.title: Chest Lift
exercises.description: Basic abdominal curl focusing on proper core engagement.
exercises.description_es: Curl abdominal básico enfocado en el correcto compromiso del core.

exercises.title: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Alternate between arching and rounding the spine for mobility.
exercises.description_es: Alterna entre arquear y redondear la columna para movilidad.

exercises.title: Roll Up
exercises.description: Articulate through the spine as you roll up to sitting and back down.
exercises.description_es: Articula a través de la columna mientras te enrollas hasta sentarte y vuelves a bajar.

exercises.title: Roll Over
exercises.description: Roll legs overhead, then articulate spine back down to mat.
exercises.description_es: Rueda las piernas sobre la cabeza, luego articula la columna de vuelta al tapete.

exercises.title: Single Leg Circles
exercises.description: Circle one leg while keeping pelvis stable.
exercises.description_es: Haz círculos con una pierna manteniendo la pelvis estable.

exercises.title: Rolling Like a Ball
exercises.description: Roll back and forth maintaining a curved spine and balance.
exercises.description_es: Rueda hacia atrás y adelante manteniendo la columna curva y el equilibrio.

exercises.title: Single Leg Stretch
exercises.description: Alternate pulling one knee in while extending the other leg.
exercises.description_es: Alterna llevando una rodilla mientras extiendes la otra pierna.

exercises.title: Double Leg Stretch
exercises.description: Extend arms and legs simultaneously, then circle arms to pull knees in.
exercises.description_es: Extiende brazos y piernas simultáneamente, luego circula los brazos para traer las rodillas.

exercises.title: Single Straight Leg Stretch
exercises.description: Scissors legs while maintaining lifted chest and stable pelvis.
exercises.description_es: Tijeras con las piernas manteniendo el pecho elevado y la pelvis estable.

exercises.title: Double Straight Leg Stretch
exercises.description: Lower and lift both straight legs while maintaining stable spine.
exercises.description_es: Baja y sube ambas piernas rectas manteniendo la columna estable.

exercises.title: Criss Cross
exercises.description: Rotate torso to bring elbow toward opposite knee.
exercises.description_es: Rota el torso para llevar el codo hacia la rodilla opuesta.

exercises.title: Spine Stretch Forward
exercises.description: Round forward over straight legs, then stack spine to return.
exercises.description_es: Redondea hacia adelante sobre piernas rectas, luego apila la columna para volver.

exercises.title: Open Leg Rocker
exercises.description: Balance in V-sit and rock back and forth with control.
exercises.description_es: Equilibrio en V-sit y balancea hacia atrás y adelante con control.

exercises.title: Corkscrew
exercises.description: Circle legs together while keeping upper body stable.
exercises.description_es: Circula las piernas juntas manteniendo el torso superior estable.

exercises.title: Saw
exercises.description: Twist and reach opposite hand toward foot in sawing motion.
exercises.description_es: Gira y estira la mano opuesta hacia el pie en movimiento de sierra.

exercises.title: Swan
exercises.description: Lift chest and extend spine while pressing into hands.
exercises.description_es: Eleva el pecho y extiende la columna presionando las manos.

exercises.title: Swan Dive
exercises.description: Rock between lifting chest and lifting legs in dynamic motion.
exercises.description_es: Balancea entre elevar el pecho y elevar las piernas en movimiento dinámico.

exercises.title: Single Leg Kick
exercises.description: Kick heel toward glutes while lying on stomach.
exercises.description_es: Patea el talón hacia los glúteos mientras estás boca abajo.

exercises.title: Double Leg Kick
exercises.description: Kick both heels, then extend arms and lift chest.
exercises.description_es: Patea ambos talones, luego extiende brazos y eleva el pecho.

exercises.title: Neck Pull
exercises.description: Roll up and over with hands behind head.
exercises.description_es: Rueda hacia arriba y sobre con manos detrás de la cabeza.

exercises.title: Scissors
exercises.description: Split legs in air while balancing on shoulders.
exercises.description_es: Separa las piernas en el aire mientras te equilibras sobre los hombros.

exercises.title: Bicycle
exercises.description: Pedal legs in bicycle motion while on shoulders.
exercises.description_es: Pedalea las piernas en movimiento de bicicleta sobre los hombros.

exercises.title: Shoulder Bridge
exercises.description: Hold bridge position and kick one leg to ceiling.
exercises.description_es: Mantén la posición de puente y patea una pierna hacia el techo.

exercises.title: Spine Twist
exercises.description: Seated twist with arms extended to sides.
exercises.description_es: Giro sentada con brazos extendidos a los lados.

exercises.title: Jackknife
exercises.description: Roll legs overhead then pike up to vertical.
exercises.description_es: Rueda las piernas sobre la cabeza y sube a vertical.

exercises.title: Side Kick Front/Back
exercises.description: Kick leg forward and back while lying on side.
exercises.description_es: Patea la pierna hacia adelante y atrás mientras estás de lado.

exercises.title: Side Kick Up/Down
exercises.description: Lift and lower leg while lying on side.
exercises.description_es: Eleva y baja la pierna mientras estás de lado.

exercises.title: Side Kick Circles
exercises.description: Small circles with top leg while lying on side.
exercises.description_es: Pequeños círculos con la pierna de arriba mientras estás de lado.

exercises.title: Inner Thigh Lift
exercises.description: Lift bottom leg while lying on side.
exercises.description_es: Eleva la pierna de abajo mientras estás de lado.

exercises.title: Teaser I
exercises.description: Roll up to V-sit with legs at 45 degrees.
exercises.description_es: Rueda hasta V-sit con piernas a 45 grados.

exercises.title: Teaser II
exercises.description: Lower and lift legs while maintaining V-sit position.
exercises.description_es: Baja y sube las piernas manteniendo la posición V-sit.

exercises.title: Teaser III
exercises.description: Lower everything and roll back up to full teaser.
exercises.description_es: Baja todo y vuelve a subir al teaser completo.

exercises.title: Hip Circles
exercises.description: Circle legs while balancing on hands behind you.
exercises.description_es: Circula las piernas mientras te equilibras con las manos detrás.

exercises.title: Swimming
exercises.description: Alternate lifting opposite arm and leg while on stomach.
exercises.description_es: Alterna elevar brazo y pierna opuestos mientras estás boca abajo.

exercises.title: Leg Pull Front
exercises.description: In plank, lift one leg while pressing back through heel.
exercises.description_es: En plancha, eleva una pierna mientras presionas hacia atrás con el talón.

exercises.title: Leg Pull Back
exercises.description: In reverse plank, kick one leg up.
exercises.description_es: En plancha inversa, patea una pierna hacia arriba.

exercises.title: Kneeling Side Kick
exercises.description: From kneeling, extend leg and kick forward/back.
exercises.description_es: Desde rodillas, extiende la pierna y patea adelante/atrás.

exercises.title: Side Bend
exercises.description: Press up into side plank and arc body up.
exercises.description_es: Sube a plancha lateral y arquea el cuerpo hacia arriba.

exercises.title: Boomerang
exercises.description: Roll back, switch legs, roll up to teaser, then stretch forward.
exercises.description_es: Rueda hacia atrás, cambia piernas, sube a teaser, luego estira hacia adelante.

exercises.title: Seal
exercises.description: Roll back and forth clapping heels together like a seal.
exercises.description_es: Rueda adelante y atrás aplaudiendo los talones como una foca.

exercises.title: Crab
exercises.description: Roll back, switch crossed legs, roll up to balance.
exercises.description_es: Rueda hacia atrás, cambia piernas cruzadas, sube a equilibrio.

exercises.title: Rocking
exercises.description: Hold ankles and rock forward and back on stomach.
exercises.description_es: Sostén los tobillos y balancea adelante y atrás boca abajo.

exercises.title: Control Balance
exercises.description: From shoulder stand, lower one leg to floor and switch.
exercises.description_es: Desde parada de hombros, baja una pierna al piso y cambia.

exercises.title: Plank
exercises.description: Hold body in straight line from head to heels.
exercises.description_es: Mantén el cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.

exercises.title: Pilates Push-Up
exercises.description: Walk hands out to plank, do push-ups, walk back up.
exercises.description_es: Camina las manos a plancha, haz flexiones, vuelve caminando.

exercises.title: Mermaid Stretch
exercises.description: Seated side stretch reaching arm overhead.
exercises.description_es: Estiramiento lateral sentada con brazo sobre la cabeza.

exercises.title: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Rest position with hips back and arms extended forward.
exercises.description_es: Posición de descanso con caderas hacia atrás y brazos extendidos.

exercises.title: Shell Stretch
exercises.description: Curl into ball shape and breathe into lower back.
exercises.description_es: Enróllate en forma de bola y respira hacia la espalda baja.

exercises.title: Figure Four Stretch
exercises.description: Cross ankle over knee and pull thigh toward chest.
exercises.description_es: Cruza el tobillo sobre la rodilla y lleva el muslo hacia el pecho.

exercises.title: Spinal Twist Stretch
exercises.description: Lying twist to stretch spine and release tension.
exercises.description_es: Giro acostada para estirar la columna y liberar tensión.

exercises.title: Ball Bridge
exercises.description: Perform bridge with feet on stability ball for extra challenge.
exercises.description_es: Realiza puente con pies en la pelota de estabilidad para mayor desafío.

exercises.title: Ball Roll Out
exercises.description: Kneel and roll ball forward with forearms, then return.
exercises.description_es: Arrodíllate y rueda la pelota hacia adelante con los antebrazos, luego vuelve.

exercises.title: Ball Pike
exercises.description: From plank with feet on ball, pike hips up to ceiling.
exercises.description_es: Desde plancha con pies en la pelota, sube las caderas hacia el techo.

exercises.title: Ball Plank
exercises.description: Hold plank with forearms on stability ball.
exercises.description_es: Mantén plancha con antebrazos en la pelota de estabilidad.

exercises.title: Ball Crunch
exercises.description: Perform abdominal curls with back supported on ball.
exercises.description_es: Realiza curls abdominales con la espalda apoyada en la pelota.

exercises.title: Ball Oblique Twist
exercises.description: Twist torso while balanced on stability ball.
exercises.description_es: Gira el torso mientras te equilibras en la pelota de estabilidad.

exercises.title: Ball Back Extension
exercises.description: Drape over ball and lift chest for back extension.
exercises.description_es: Acuéstate sobre la pelota y eleva el pecho para extensión de espalda.

exercises.title: Ball Hamstring Curl
exercises.description: Bridge with heels on ball, then curl ball toward glutes.
exercises.description_es: Puente con talones en la pelota, luego enrolla la pelota hacia los glúteos.

exercises.title: Ball Wall Squat
exercises.description: Squat with ball between back and wall.
exercises.description_es: Sentadilla con pelota entre la espalda y la pared.

exercises.title: Ball Leg Lift
exercises.description: Hold ball between ankles and lift legs.
exercises.description_es: Sostén la pelota entre los tobillos y eleva las piernas.

exercises.title: Ball Seated Balance
exercises.description: Sit on ball and lift one or both feet for balance challenge.
exercises.description_es: Siéntate en la pelota y eleva uno o ambos pies para desafío de equilibrio.

exercises.title: Ball Side Stretch
exercises.description: Drape side body over ball for deep lateral stretch.
exercises.description_es: Acuesta el costado sobre la pelota para estiramiento lateral profundo.

exercises.title: Ball Chest Stretch
exercises.description: Lie back over ball with arms open to stretch chest.
exercises.description_es: Acuéstate hacia atrás sobre la pelota con brazos abiertos para estirar el pecho.

exercises.title: Ball Hip Circles
exercises.description: Sit on ball and make circles with hips for mobility.
exercises.description_es: Siéntate en la pelota y haz círculos con las caderas para movilidad.

exercises.title: Ball Prone Cobra
exercises.description: Lie face down on ball and lift arms into Y position.
exercises.description_es: Acuéstate boca abajo en la pelota y eleva los brazos en posición Y.

exercises.title: Ring Inner Thigh Squeeze
exercises.description: Squeeze ring between inner thighs while lying down.
exercises.description_es: Aprieta el aro entre los muslos internos mientras estás acostada.

exercises.title: Ring Outer Thigh Press
exercises.title_es: Presión de Muslo Externo con Aro
exercises.description: Press outward against ring wrapped around thighs.
exercises.description_es: Presiona hacia afuera contra el aro envuelto alrededor de los muslos.

exercises.title: Ring Chest Squeeze
exercises.description: Hold ring between palms and squeeze to work chest.
exercises.description_es: Sostén el aro entre las palmas y aprieta para trabajar el pecho.

exercises.title: Ring Arm Press
exercises.description: Hold ring overhead and press in to engage arms.
exercises.description_es: Sostén el aro sobre la cabeza y presiona para involucrar los brazos.

exercises.title: Ring Hundred
exercises.description: Perform the hundred while squeezing ring between ankles.
exercises.description_es: Realiza el cien mientras aprietas el aro entre los tobillos.

exercises.title: Ring Bridge
exercises.description: Perform bridge while squeezing ring between knees.
exercises.description_es: Realiza puente mientras aprietas el aro entre las rodillas.

exercises.title: Ring Standing Squeeze
exercises.description: Stand and squeeze ring between inner thighs for toning.
exercises.description_es: Párate y aprieta el aro entre los muslos internos para tonificar.

exercises.title: Ring Teaser
exercises.description: Perform teaser while squeezing ring between ankles.
exercises.description_es: Realiza teaser mientras aprietas el aro entre los tobillos.

exercises.title: Ring Side Lying Press
exercises.description: Press down on ring while lying on side for outer hip work.
exercises.description_es: Presiona hacia abajo el aro mientras estás de lado para trabajo de cadera externa.

exercises.title: Ring Tricep Press
exercises.description: Hold ring behind back and press to work triceps.
exercises.description_es: Sostén el aro detrás de la espalda y presiona para trabajar los tríceps.

exercises.title: Ring Ab Curl
exercises.description: Perform ab curl while squeezing ring between ankles.
exercises.description_es: Realiza curl abdominal mientras aprietas el aro entre los tobillos.

exercises.title: Ring Seated Squeeze
exercises.description: Sit tall and squeeze ring between knees rhythmically.
exercises.description_es: Siéntate alta y aprieta el aro entre las rodillas rítmicamente.

exercises.title: Ring Overhead Stretch
exercises.title_es: Estiramiento Sobre la Cabeza con Aro
exercises.description: Hold ring overhead and lean side to side for stretch.
exercises.description_es: Sostén el aro sobre la cabeza e inclínate de lado a lado para estirar.

exercises.title: Band Pull Apart
exercises.description: Hold band in front and pull apart to work upper back.
exercises.description_es: Sostén la banda al frente y separa para trabajar la espalda alta.

exercises.title: Band Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Stand on band and curl hands toward shoulders.
exercises.description_es: Párate sobre la banda y enrolla las manos hacia los hombros.

exercises.title: Band Tricep Extension
exercises.description: Hold band behind head and extend arms up.
exercises.description_es: Sostén la banda detrás de la cabeza y extiende los brazos hacia arriba.

exercises.title: Band Seated Row
exercises.description: Wrap band around feet and row toward waist.
exercises.description_es: Envuelve la banda alrededor de los pies y rema hacia la cintura.

exercises.title: Band Chest Press
exercises.description: Wrap band behind back and press forward.
exercises.description_es: Envuelve la banda detrás de la espalda y presiona hacia adelante.

exercises.title: Band Lateral Walk
exercises.description: Place band around thighs and walk sideways.
exercises.description_es: Coloca la banda alrededor de los muslos y camina de lado.

exercises.title: Band Squat
exercises.description: Squat with band around thighs for added resistance.
exercises.description_es: Sentadilla con banda alrededor de los muslos para resistencia adicional.

exercises.title: Band Clamshell
exercises.description: Side-lying clamshell with band around thighs.
exercises.description_es: Almeja de lado con banda alrededor de los muslos.

exercises.title: Band Glute Bridge
exercises.description: Perform bridge with band around thighs.
exercises.description_es: Realiza puente con banda alrededor de los muslos.

exercises.title: Band Leg Press
exercises.description: Lie on back and press leg against band resistance.
exercises.description_es: Acuéstate y presiona la pierna contra la resistencia de la banda.

exercises.title: Band Hundred
exercises.description: Perform the hundred with band wrapped around feet.
exercises.description_es: Realiza el cien con banda envuelta alrededor de los pies.

exercises.title: Band Assisted Roll Up
exercises.description: Use band around feet to assist with roll up movement.
exercises.description_es: Usa la banda alrededor de los pies para asistir el movimiento de roll up.

exercises.title: Band Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Use band to assist with shoulder stretches.
exercises.description_es: Usa la banda para asistir con estiramientos de hombros.

exercises.title: Band Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: Lie on back and use band to stretch hamstrings.
exercises.description_es: Acuéstate y usa la banda para estirar los isquiotibiales.

exercises.title: Band Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.title_es: Estiramiento de Flexor de Cadera con Banda
exercises.description: Use band to assist with hip flexor stretches.
exercises.description_es: Usa la banda para asistir con estiramientos del flexor de cadera.
